iam_logs_data_streams_description_defaul: By subscribing to your customer account’s security logs, they will be transferred to the Logs Data Platform. This platform gives you access to advanced features such as alerting, search execution, and retention management.
iam_logs_data_streams_description: By subscribing to your customer account’s security logs, they will be transferred to the Logs Data Platform. This platform gives you access to advanced features such as alerting, search execution, and retention management.
